                      java.lang.Boolean validate,

               throws AuthenticationException,
                      InvalidRequestException,
                      APIConnectionException,
                      APIException,
                      ChannelException
        Post payment
        参数:
        receiver - payment receiver
        pay - payment amount
        validate - true if wait for payment result
        resourceID - payment resource ID

        PostResult instance
